idea-plugin.name: Vertical Align
idea-plugin.description:
Allows you to indent multiplie cursors with spaces.
Create a multicursor, press `Alt+Shift+T` and cursors will be aligned with the rightmost one.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
• Fixed a bug resulting in an exception when there were more than two carets on the same line.
• Updated plugin.xml to make the plugin available in all IDEA builds since 2019.2 (build 192).
• Fixed an issue where carets sometimes were not vertically aligned after plugin usage.

action.description: Vertically aligns several multicursors to match rightmost one's position
